00060 void GraphicRootTracker::initClass()

00062         SO_NODEENGINE_INIT_CLASS( GraphicRootTracker, TTracker, "TTracker" );

00066 GraphicRootTracker::GraphicRootTracker()
00067 {
00068         SO_NODEENGINE_CONSTRUCTOR( GraphicRootTracker );
00069 
00070         // Define input fields and their default values
00071         SO_NODE_ADD_FIELD( m_azimuth, ( 0.0 ) );
00072         SO_NODE_ADD_FIELD( m_zenith, ( 90.0 ) );
00073 
00074         //ConstructEngineOutput();
00075         SO_NODEENGINE_ADD_OUTPUT( outputTranslation, SoSFVec3f);
00076         SO_NODEENGINE_ADD_OUTPUT( outputRotation, SoSFRotation);
00077         SO_NODEENGINE_ADD_OUTPUT( outputScaleFactor, SoSFVec3f);
00078         SO_NODEENGINE_ADD_OUTPUT( outputScaleOrientation, SoSFRotation);
00079         SO_NODEENGINE_ADD_OUTPUT( outputCenter, SoSFVec3f);
00080 
00081 
00082 }

00094 void GraphicRootTracker::evaluate()
00095 {
00096 
00097         if (!IsConnected()) return;
00098 
00099         double alpha = tgc::Pi - GetAzimuth();
00100 
00101         SbVec3f yAxis( 0.0, 1.0, 0.0 );
00102         SbRotation yRotation( yAxis, alpha );
00103         SbVec3f xAxis( 1.0, 0.0, 0.0 );
00104         SbRotation xRotation( xAxis, GetZenith() );
00105 
00106         SbRotation rotation = xRotation * yRotation;
00107 
00108         SetEngineOutputRotation(rotation);
00109 
00110         /*SO_ENGINE_OUTPUT( outputTranslation, SoSFVec3f, setValue( SbVec3f( 0.0, 0.0, 0.0 ) ) );
00111         SO_ENGINE_OUTPUT( outputRotation, SoSFRotation, setValue( rotation ) );
00112         SO_ENGINE_OUTPUT( outputScaleFactor, SoSFVec3f, setValue( SbVec3f( 1.0, 1.0, 1.0 ) ) );
00113         SO_ENGINE_OUTPUT( outputScaleOrientation, SoSFRotation, setValue( SbRotation() ) );
00114         SO_ENGINE_OUTPUT( outputCenter, SoSFVec3f, setValue( SbVec3f( 0.0, 0.0, 0.0 ) ) );*/
00115 
00116 }
